ASSET Research CVEs

October 17, 2019

NEW: Seven new CVEs assigned (CVE-2019-16336, CVE-2019-17060, CVE-2019-17061, CVE-2019-17517, CVE-2019-17518, CVE-2019-17519, CVE-2019-17520) and more awaiting to show how to cause havoc in wireless systems (currently undisclosed for confidentiality). If you are in a "smart" nation, then you are almost certainly at risk (drive slow and do not get sick). Watch this space in a month when we disclose the exploits and the details.

Information Systems Technology and Design at the Singapore University of Technology and Design
